description: The primary ability of the Yomi Yomi no Mi that allowed Brook to resurrect after death. His soul returned to his body, but due to the delay in finding his corpse in the fog, only his skeleton remained.
limitations: Only works once - grants one resurrection after the user's first death
Requires the soul to find and return to the original body
If the body has decomposed, the user returns as a skeleton
visualDescription: Brook exists as a living skeleton with an afro, demonstrating the Yomi Yomi no Mi's resurrection power.
combatApplications: Not a combat ability - purely a resurrection power that has already been used.
